bill_title: Honoring Kristine K. Malloy of Parkston as South Dakota's 1999 Teacher of the Year.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Kristine K. Malloy of Parkston as South Dakota's 1999 Teacher of the Year. WHEREAS, Kristine K. Malloy, a third grade teacher at Parkston Elementary School in Parkston was chosen as the 1999 South Dakota Teacher of the Year and represented South Dakota in national competition for Teacher of the Year; and WHEREAS, she has dedicated more than fourteen years to the teaching profession, all of those years in the Parkston school system; and WHEREAS, one of her greatest contributions to education is her ability to involve parents and the community in school activities such as "Math Mania" and the "Grandfather Program": NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-fourth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Kristine K. Malloy be congratulated on her selection as South Dakota's 1999 Teacher of the Year.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Kristine K. Malloy of Parkston as South Dakota's 1999 Teacher of the Year. WHEREAS, Kristine K. Malloy, a third grade teacher at Parkston Elementary School in Parkston was chosen as the 1999 South Dakota Teacher of the Year and represented South Dakota in national competition for Teacher of the Year; and WHEREAS, she has dedicated more than fourteen years to the teaching profession, all of those years in the Parkston school system; and WHEREAS, one of her greatest contributions to education is her ability to involve parents and the community in school activities such as "Math Mania" and the "Grandfather Program": NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-fourth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Kristine K. Malloy be congratulated on her selection as South Dakota's 1999 Teacher of the Year.
